data.rationale: Investigation found: 1) Timestamp IDs would prevent collision but not fix merge conflicts (conflicts are in entity content, not IDs). 2) Sequential IDs are human-readable and meaningful for sprint numbering. 3) Collision risk is low since sprints are created less frequently than tasks. 4) Recommendation: Keep S-NNN for now, revisit if parallel sprint creation becomes common. Note: The merge conflict fix (Option 3 from D-20251226-130828) is more impactful.
data.title: Keep sequential sprint IDs, consider timestamp format for future
